channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Symphony
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Symphony

item.title: CVE-2018-1706|2024-09-17T00:46:44.106Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20symphony
item.description: IBM Spectrum Symphony 7.2.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 146341.

item.title: CVE-2018-1708|2024-09-17T03:03:29.869Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20symphony
item.description: IBM Spectrum Symphony 7.1.2 and 7.2.0.2 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive user information such as passwords through the WebUI. IBM X-Force ID: 146343.
